abstract: The model Frida Gustavsson transforms with makeup by Stephane Marais and hair by Guido Palau.
snippet: The model Frida Gustavsson transforms with makeup by Stephane Marais and hair by Guido Palau.
lead_paragraph: The photographer Greg Kessler captures the transformations of Paris Fashion Week. Here, the model Frida Gustavsson from IMG before (left) and after (right) transforms, with makeup by Stephane Marais and hair by Guido Palau for Redken. (Drag the orange bar left to reveal the full transformation.)

headline.main: Model-Morphosis | Frida Gustavsson at Jean Paul Gaultier
